newsitem.title: USA: Dow Jones average gains more than 100 points.
newsitem.headline: Dow Jones average gains more than 100 points.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average gained more than 100 points at the close of trading Monday as Wall Street bet that the market already may have taken into account what is expected to be a quarter-point rise in short-term interest rates by the Federal Reserve.
At 4 p.m. EST, the Dow was up 100.08 points at 6,904.87.
